body:
Welp, TaskCluster failed. It failed linting and tests, likely due to the fact that these weren't working properly until #693. #697 includes test fixes along with the refactor to mochitest, so I merged that, and the tests passed locally. I also added a commit to fix the new linting errors. 9625c2c is the only code unique to this PR.

@mythmon @gijsk I'm leaving this up to see if automation passes with all the fixes, but I'm not sure quite the order to land this. Should we r+ #697, review the lint fix commit in this PR, and then land this? Should we land #697 with broken automation and then land this PR afterwards?

body_html:
Welp, TaskCluster failed. It failed linting and tests, likely due to the fact that these weren't working properly until #693. #697 includes test fixes along with the refactor to mochitest, so I merged that, and the tests passed locally. I also added a commit to fix the new linting errors. 9625c2c is the only code unique to this PR.

@mythmon @gijsk I'm leaving this up to see if automation passes with all the fixes, but I'm not sure quite the order to land this. Should we r+ #697, review the lint fix commit in this PR, and then land this? Should we land #697 with broken automation and then land this PR afterwards?
